They will AUTOMATICALLY DECLINE ANY TRANSACTION ATTEMPTED WITH YOUR DEBIT CARD IF YOUR PHONE ISN'T @ THE SAME LOCATION WHERE THE TRANSACTION IS BEING ATTEMPED, & you can easily switch it off whenever. If you travel a lot then you NEED this account! Check it out you won't regret it TRUST ME!
